title: AVATAR training: dramatically slow speed
body:
Please look into my log, as I think it's not working properly. 

The iteration speed ( in ms ) looks OK, but the time between 2 iterations is **MUCH longer** than it should be.

_For example iteration speed is 1000ms / per 1, but the time spent for each is 30-60seconds_

```
[11:21:48][#002606][2421ms][1.3686][0.4142][0.0000]
[11:37:07][#002668][2390ms][1.3434][0.4148][0.0000]
[11:52:30][#002728][2407ms][1.3365][0.4266][0.0000]
[12:07:46][#002787][2406ms][1.3099][0.4570][0.0000]
[12:08:36][#002791][2421ms][1.3163][0.4502][0.0000]
```

My configurations is:
```
================= Model Summary =================
==                                             ==
==            Model name: AVATAR               ==
==                                             ==
==     Current iteration: 2557                 ==
==                                             ==
==--------------- Model Options ---------------==
==                                             ==
==            autobackup: True                 ==
== write_preview_history: True                 ==
==            batch_size: 96                   ==
==           avatar_type: head                 ==
==                 stage: 1                    ==
==                                             ==
==---------------- Running On -----------------==
==                                             ==
==          Device index: 0                    ==
==                  Name: Tesla P100-PCIE-16GB ==
==                  VRAM: 16.00GB              ==
==                                             ==
=================================================
```

Is it normal?
